comment: He's a great professor! Be sure to go to class and get the notes. I noticed that I did better on the tests I went to class for. He allows cheat sheets on his tests, also!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: SOOOO chill. Like, he lectures and never got passionate about anything. Not very clear when answering Qs, if you don't understand he sorta shrugs, but most things he explains well. Got weekly homework and formula sheets for the five tests (drop one for attendance grade if higher). 6 Qs each, easier than homework. Breakout helps, soemtimes end early
TAKE HIM FOR LAB!!! He goes over all of the equations you'll use for the report and he is an easy grader!

Dr. Stout is a great lab professor. You come to lab, he writes out the formulas and explains all steps, you do it and just like that you're done with lab. He usually will grade last weeks lab and hand it back before you even finish the current lab. He also inputs grades during lab. If you need help, ask and he will gladly oblige. Super nice man.

Professor Stout has lectures twice a week. Go to them! Not only are helpful, but they also consist similar questions that will be on the test. His tests consist of 6 questions, each is short answer and are easy. Don't worry about failing the test, he's a lenient grader and gives partial credit. BTW, the homework is much harder than the tests.

Stout is one of the best profs I have ever taken! His tests are 6 questions each, 5 of them. He drops one. He also drops 3 homework assignments (webAssign). He allows you a study sheet on the test and he goes over lots of examples. Taking him again for 1112 :)
Stout was amazing at making physics not only easy to understand but super fun. Would def take him for any physics class

EASY A. TAKE HIM. MADE PHYSICS EASY. Go to class, do online homework (time consuming and not useful,  pay for chegg) don't buy the book it's awful, pay attention to reviews as they are variations of the test questions (don't waste time studying all material covered in class). For lab, if you do the work and show units you will get a 100 on reports.

Want a professor that's straightforward and helpful? Take Stout.  His reviews are a replica of his test so do them, and EASY A.  5 tests, 1 final, EACH EXAM ONLY 6 Questions.  I wasted my money buying a textbook.  As a person, he's a little on the quiet side, but so so so nice and approachable.  Class act. Professional.  Had him for lab too. Easy A
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Dr. Stout was super great. As long as you come to class you will do fine on the tests. He gives partial credit even if your numbers are wrong but your formulas are right. Overall it's a pretty easy class.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--TEST HEAVY
